amendment.description: Amendments limit to 30 percent of income the maximum rent that veterans are required to pay for public housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, consisting the amendments printed in the Congressional Record of May 7, 1996 as amendment Nos. 14 and 18, to limit to 30% of income the maximum rent that veterans could pay for public housing.

action.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendments (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
